Cherrycake\Modules\DatabaseProvider::updateByUniqueField

Updates a single row in the database identified by the given $idFieldName and $idFieldValue with the given $fields data. More complex updates should be done by the app by calling other methods on this class like prepareAndExecute

    Signature

    public function updateByUniqueField(string $tableName, string $idFieldName, mixed $idFieldValue, array $fields )

    Parameters

    $tableName — string
    The table name
    $idFieldName — string
    The name of the field that uniquely identified the row to be updated
    $idFieldValue — mixed
    The field value for the row to be update
    $fields — array
    A hash array of field values

    Returns

    boolean
    True if everything went ok, false otherwise
